CKV_AWS_144.Name: Ensure that S3 bucket has cross-region replication enabled

CKV_AWS_111.Reason: Admin access given to Terraform Deployer

CKV_AWS_338.Name: Ensure CloudWatch log groups retains logs for at least 1 year
CKV_AWS_338.Reason: 1 year is not necessary for this project
